info.name: MCP Server - HTTP Façade
info.description: Collection for MCP Server smoke checks and façade endpoints. Use the `base_url` variable to point at preview or production URLs.

exec: // If a session cookie is stored, add it as a Cookie header when missing
} catch (e) { console.log('mcp collection prerequest error', e); }
pm.test('Has status ok in body', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('status', 'ok'); });
pm.test('Contains uptime_seconds and node', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('uptime_seconds'); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('node'); });
pm.test('If 200, status is ready', function () { if (pm.response.code === 200) { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('status', 'ready'); } });
pm.test('Has source field', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('source'); });
pm.test('source is spotify', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json.source).to.equal('spotify'); });
pm.test('Has source and timestamp', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('source'); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('timestamp'); });
pm.test('is_playing is boolean', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(typeof json.is_playing).to.equal('boolean'); });
pm.test('source is spotify', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json.source).to.equal('spotify'); });
pm.test('If 200, response is JSON object', function () { if (pm.response.code === 200) { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.be.an('object'); } });
pm.test('If 200, response is JSON object', function () { if (pm.response.code === 200) { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.be.an('object'); } });
pm.test('Response is JSON or contains json-like', function () { try { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.be.ok; } catch (e) { pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include('{'); } });
pm.test('Has user in response', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('user'); });
pm.test('Has user in response', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('user'); });
// Ensure a session cookie is set and save it to collection variable 'session_cookie'
pm.test('Sets session cookie and stores it', function () {
if (m) { pm.collectionVariables.set('session_cookie', m[1]); } else { pm.expect.fail('session cookie not found in set-cookie'); }

pm.test('If 201, response has id and email', function () { if (pm.response.code === 201) { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('id'); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('email'); } });
pm.test('If 200, has id', function () { if (pm.response.code === 200) { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('id'); } });
if (pm.response.code === 200) { var sc = pm.response.headers.get('set-cookie'); if (sc) { var m = sc.match(/session=([^;]+)/); if (m) pm.collectionVariables.set('session_cookie', m[1]); } }
pm.test('Body is array', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(Array.isArray(json)).to.be.true; });
pm.test('Has email in body', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('email'); });
pm.test('Has ip', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('ip'); });
pm.test('Has jwksUrl flag', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('jwksUrl'); });
pm.test('Not found body', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('error'); });
pm.test('Has books array', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('books'); });
pm.test('Books is array', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(Array.isArray(json.books)).to.be.true; });

pm.test('Books items include averageRating and ratingCount', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); if (Array.isArray(json.books) && json.books.length>0) { pm.expect(json.books[0]).to.have.property('averageRating'); pm.expect(json.books[0]).to.have.property('ratingCount'); } });
pm.test('Has title', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('title'); });
pm.test('Has authors', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('authors'); });
pm.test('Has averageRating and ratingCount', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('averageRating'); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('ratingCount'); });

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Test Book",
  "description": "A test book for API testing",
  "isbn": "9781234567890",
  "publishedAt": "2024-01-01",
  "authorIds": [1]
}

exec: pm.test('Has id', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('id'); });

pm.test('Created book has rating fields with defaults', function () { var json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('ratingCount'); pm.expect(json.ratingCount).to.equal(0); pm.expect(json).to.have.property('averageRating'); pm.expect(json.averageRating).to.equal(null); });
